trans-unit.source: Defines a rectangular hot spot region in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un'area sensibile rettangolare in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: This class defines a rectangular hot spot region in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe definisce un'area sensibile rettangolare in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: To define the region of the RectangleHotSpot object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner.
trans-unit.target: Per definire l'area dell'oggetto RectangleHotSpot, impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>angolo sinistra sul valore che rappresenta la coordinata x della parte superiore dell'area rettangolare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>angolo sinistra sul valore che rappresenta la coordinata y della parte superiore dell'area rettangolare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>sul valore che rappresenta la coordinata x dell'angolo inferiore destro dell'area rettangolare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: Set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>sul valore che rappresenta la coordinata y dell'angolo inferiore destro dell'area rettangolare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a RectangleHotSpot control is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Quando si seleziona un controllo RectangleHotSpot, la pagina passa a un URL, genera un postback al server o non esegue alcuna operazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property specifies this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>proprietà specifica di questo comportamento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To navigate to a URL, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate` and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Per passare a un URL, impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>proprietà `HotSpotMode.Navigate` e utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>proprietà per specificare l'URL a cui passare.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To post back to the server, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack` and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the RectangleHotSpot object.
trans-unit.target: Per registrare nuovamente al server, impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>proprietà `HotSpotMode.PostBack` e utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>proprietà per specificare un nome per l'oggetto RectangleHotSpot.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when the RectangleHotSpot is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Questo nome verrà passato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>dati dell'evento quando viene selezionato il RectangleHotSpot.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to have no behavior, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>oggetto non hanno alcun comportamento, impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>proprietà `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per inizializzare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la coordinata y del lato inferiore dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The Bottom property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà basso consente di ottenere o impostare un valore che rappresenta la coordinata y del lato inferiore dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per definire completamente un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>dell'oggetto, è necessario specificare un valore per questa proprietà e per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata y del lato inferiore dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the x -and y-coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che rappresenta la x-y pari e un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> dell'oggetto angolo superiore sinistro e le coordinate x e y inferiore nell'angolo destro.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that represents the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object's top left corner and the coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce una stringa che rappresenta le coordinate di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>dell'oggetto angolo superiore sinistro e le coordinate inferiore nell'angolo destro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: This method uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> properties to return the coordinates for the top left corner.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo utilizza i valori assegnati al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>per restituire le coordinate dell'angolo superiore sinistro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: It uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties to return the coordinates for the bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: Usa i valori assegnati al <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>proprietà da restituire nell'angolo destro le coordinate per la parte inferiore.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GetCoordinates method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetCoordinates viene utilizzato internamente da ASP.NET per ottenere il testo da utilizzare per le coordinate di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>quando è sottoposto a rendering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language.
trans-unit.target: La stringa restituita è specifica per il browser e linguaggio di markup.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta le coordinate x e y di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> dell'oggetto angolo superiore sinistro e le coordinate x e y inferiore nell'angolo destro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la coordinata x del lato sinistro dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The Left property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà a sinistra consente di ottenere o impostare un valore che rappresenta la coordinata x del lato sinistro dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per definire completamente un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>dell'oggetto, è necessario specificare un valore per questa proprietà e per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata x del lato sinistro dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la coordinata x del lato destro dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The Right property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà destra consente di ottenere o impostare un valore che rappresenta la coordinata x del lato destro dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per definire completamente un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>oggetto, è necessario specificare un valore per questa proprietà e per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata x del lato destro dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la coordinata y del lato superiore dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The Top property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Top consente di ottenere o impostare un valore che rappresenta la coordinata y del lato superiore dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: Per definire completamente un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: you must specify a value for this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: è necessario specificare un valore per questa proprietà e per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: La coordinata y del lato superiore dell'area rettangolare definita da questo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.
